meanings.definition: In a manner that involves being married to only one person at a time.
meanings.sent1: She promised to love him monogamously forever.
meanings.sent2: They lived monogamously, committed to each other for life.
meanings.sent3: The idea of being monogamously tied down scared him.
meanings.sent4: Their monogamous marriage was a beacon of stability in a chaotic world.
meanings.sent5: He vowed monogamously to cherish her till the end of time.

meanings.definition: In a manner that involves having a sexual relationship with only one partner.
meanings.sent1: They chose to explore their intimacy monogamously.
meanings.sent2: She believed in loving monogamously to deepen the bond.
meanings.sent3: His friends teased him about being monogamously faithful.
meanings.sent4: Their monogamous connection was like a rare gem in a sea of stones.
meanings.sent5: She desired to be loved monogamously, with undivided attention.
